content:
New dungeons and weapons!
Check them out!

Patch notes:
- New: The Obsidian Vault
- New Weapon: Glaive of Ash
- Bugfixes & balance.

More details: https://andries659.github.io/rpg-game/patch-notes/1.1

Servers down 02:00-04:00 UTC for maintenance.
Plan accordingly.

Status page:
https://status.example.com

A limited time raid has begun! Rewards include gems and unique drops.
Read the full event rules:
https://andries659.github.io/rpg-game/events/autumn-raid

We talk level design and how you can contribute via GitHub Issues.
Contribute here:
https://github.com/andries659/rpg-game/issues
